metadata.title: CVE-2017-16641 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: lib/rrd.php in Cacti 1.1.27 allows remote authenticated administrators toexecute arbitrary OS commands via the path_rrdtool parameter in anaction=save request to settings.php.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
